title: MetaChat â€“ Real-time Chat App
description: Engineered a real-time chat platform supporting up to 20 concurrent users using Socket.io and JWT-secured APIs. Applied HTTP caching strategies, improving API responsiveness by an estimated 10%.

title: Distributed ML Inference Engine
description: Scalable NLP inference system with containerized task queues. Built with FastAPI for REST APIs, Celery + Redis for distributed queues, and HuggingFace Transformers for NLP inference.

title: LinkedIn Sourcing Agent
description: Built an AI sourcing agent that parsed 10+ job descriptions and searched LinkedIn via SerpAPI. Automated outreach generation using Gemini AI, improving engagement with personalized messages and confidence-based scoring.

title: Dental Appointment System
description: Designed a role-based dashboard enabling secure login, patient record management, and real-time appointment scheduling. Implemented protected routes, session persistence via localStorage, and cross-tab sync.
